name: Digital Devil Story: Megami Tensei
overview: Digital Devil Story: Megami Tensei is a game for the MSX series of computers, later ported to similar machines. Developed by Telenet, it is also the very first game in the entire Megami Tensei franchise; however, though it is based on the same source, it has no other ties to the later games developed by Atlus. The PC-88 version is essentially a remake of the original simpler MSX game. Gameplay is mostly based on the arcade game Gauntlet.
